DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a higher threshold for transfusion with red blood cells improves the tissue oxygenation.
DOC.brief_title: Establishment of Optimal Transfusion Threshold During Spine Surgery
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older Patients undergoing spine surgery Be legally competent Read and understand Danish Present malignant disease Previously apoplexia cerebri Known heart disease with functionality equivalent to NYHA II or CCS II or worse
